description.en: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.ar: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.br: Esta mística orbe irá mudar a cor da aura da sua armadura fortalecida para a cor Branca. Dura 7 dias.
description.cns: 这个神秘的球体会将你升级后的盔甲光效的颜色更改为白色。持续7天。
description.de: Ändert die existierende Aura aufgewerteter Rüstungssets in die Farbe Weiß.
description.fi: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.fil: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.fr: Votre armure enchantée émet une aura blanche pendant 7 jours.
description.id: Bola mistis ini akan mengubah warna aura armor yang kamu upgrade menjadi White. Berlangsung selama 7 hari.
description.it: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.jp: 防具の精錬エフェクトを白色に変化させることのできる期間制アイテム
description.kr: 이 신비로운 아이템은 업그레이드된 갑옷의 아우라 색상을 흰색으로 바꿉니다. 7일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.pl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.ru: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.sp: Este orbe místico cambiará el color del aura de tu armadura mejorada a Blanco. Dura 7 días.
description.sw: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to White. Lasts 7 days.
description.th: ลูกแก้วลึกลับนี้จะเปลี่ยนสีออร่าของชุดเกราะที่คุณอัพเกรดเป็นสีขาว ใช้เวลา 7 วัน
description.tw: 將防具精鍊效果變成白色，持續7天。
description.vi: Quả cầu thần bí này sẽ thay đổi màu hào quang của áo giáp nâng cấp của bạn thành Màu trắng. Kéo dài 7 ngày.
